law.full_text:
EXEMPTION FOR COLLECTIVE BARGAINING AGREEMENT.
All of the provisions of this article, or any part of the article, may be waived in a bona fide collective bargaining agreement, but only if the waiver is explicitly set forth in that agreement in clear and unambiguous terms. Unilateral implementation of terms and conditions of employment by either party to a collective bargaining relationship shall not constitute or be permitted as a waiver of all or any part of the provisions of this article.

unit.catch_line: Payment Of Minimum Compensation To Hotel Workers.

One-Year Waiver For Certain Hotel Employers.

law.plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE
EXEMPTION FOR COLLECTIVE BARGAINING AGREEMENT. (§ 104.110)
EXEMPTION FOR COLLECTIVE BARGAINING AGREEMENT. All of the provisions of this article, or any part of the article, may be waived in a bona fide collective bargaining agreement, but only if the waiver is explicitly set forth in that agreement in clear and unambiguous terms. Unilateral implementation of terms and conditions of employment by either party to a collective bargaining relationship shall not constitute or be permitted as a waiver of all or any part of the provisions of this article.
